title: An Act relative to timely public payments for work not included in original construction contracts

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Moore, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 2186) of Michael O. Moore relative to timely payments for work not included in public construction contracts.  State Administration and Regulatory Oversight.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

related_entities.name: committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/01/2025 from 10:00 AM-01:00 PM in A-1
Hearing rescheduled to 10/08/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in 222  and Virtual Hearing location changed
Hearing rescheduled to 10/08/2025 from 01:00 PM-01:55 PM in 222  and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means
